column4: i have problem using usb modem in ubuntu 12.04 lts, can any one suggest what to do
3G modem or ADSL modem. 'modem' is a very amiguous term
if you run:  lsb_release -a; uname -a; lsusb    can you please PASTEBIN the output
if you use TAB to complete nicks, its easier to type and you will highlight whom you are addressing :)
